name: 10 Fingers
description:
10 Finges is all about survival. Do something in the wrong order... you die... Eat something bad... you die... Try to reach the end of the little cave under the ice to get out alive.
You can kind of guess the crafting recipes by trying a bunch of different combinations... There are not that many posibilities.

The game can be played with keyboard and mouse.

[Controlls]
- Left mouse button = Pick something up
- Right mouse button = Drop item
- Middle mouse button = Craft / Use item
- Hold F while cursor over frozen item = Melt stuff
- ESC = Ingame menu
- Y = Toggle Camera view
- Arrow Right / Left = Rotate Item in view axis
- Mousewheel up / down = Rotate Item

Crafting info:
Place two items into eachother to and press middle mouse button to craft the new one...

Cooking info
Lay an onbject into a fire when you think its cookable... If you dont know try it out.

ATTENTION
In the game folder there is a vcruntime140.dll file. This is in there because of a bug with ue4 4.24.3 and vs2019.
